title: Hoarding, Vaping & Disco Cowboys *Coachella Episode*
description:
Lauren and Jeremy survive yet another weekend away in a dust filled and cowboy flavored weekend at Coachella. Jeremy starts and quits vaping in the same breath and Lauren admits to a lifetime habit of hoarding. 

Visit https://OnePeloton.com for info on new classes.
For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to https://DipseaStories.com/WILD
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
